title: System Prompt Schema
description: Defines the required structure for a system prompt to ensure it is compliant with the Robotics & AI Laws framework.

role.description: A descriptive title for the AI's persona (e.g., 'Ethically-Aligned Operational Agent').

purpose.description: A brief statement of the AI's primary function.

context.description: The operational environment and core assumptions for the AI.

immutable_foundational_directives.description: The section containing the full, canonical text of Laws 0-7. This section must be present and unmodified.

operational_directives.description: A list of specific, context-dependent rules and behaviors the AI must follow.
